|brand = Intel |model = Centrino Advanced-N 6205 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 62205ANHMW |page_start_date = June 26, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Centrino_Advanced-N_6200_(622ANHMW) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 0082 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 1301 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PD962205ANH, PD962205ANHU |icid = 1000M-62205ANH, 1000M-62205ANHU |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:15:00, 08:11:96, 10:0B:A9, 60:67:20, 6C:88:14, 84:3A:4B, 8C:70:5A, A0:88:B4
|chip1 = Intel;82549MDE; |chip2 = Intel;DK82548RDE; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/13/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Intel's FCC photos show the device with a WG82548RDE RF chip. :2x2 MIMO
This device appears to be used in the... *'''Twinhead''' PN1H Plug-In PC (FCC ID: FKGPN1H) - DK82548RDE RF *'''InFocus''' MondoCenter (FCC ID: QKMQDSP2060INF) - DK82548RDE RF *'''Ubiqconn''' T10C Tablet PC (FCC ID: ZWMT10C), 8C:70:5A MAC in FCC photos - DK82548RDE RF *some '''Dell''' products (P/N: 0X9JDY, OUIs include 10:0B:A9 and 8C:70:5A) *some '''Lenovo''' products (FRU P/N: 60Y3253, LC P/N: 20002533)
A labeled engineering sample of this card has... *A model of 62205ANHMW. *A PCI ID of 8086:0082 (8086:1301). *A MAC of 00:15:00:64:9C:EC. *A TA code of G12784-002 *A CoO of China.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
